oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Postmaster's appointment for Lemuel M. N. Cook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lincoln appointee Postmaster General William Dennison certifies that Cook is the official postmaster for Silver Springs, Tenn. in Wilson County, now called Beckwith.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
